mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_USER_COUPON ( USER_COUPON_ID, USER_ID, COUPON_ID, USER_COUPON_NAME, USER_COUPON_ISSUEDAY, USER_COUPON_USE, USER_COUPON_USEDAY, USER_COUPON_EXPIREDATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_USER_COUPON_ID.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{couponId}, #{userCouponName}, #{userCouponIssueday}, #{userCouponUse}, #{userCouponUseday}, #{userCouponExpiredate} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T_USER_COUPON WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_COUPON_USE = 'N' AND USER_COUPON_EXPIREDATE > SYSDATE ORDER BY USER_COUPON_ISSUEDAY DESC

SELECT uc.USER_COUPON_ID, uc.USER_ID, uc.COUPON_ID, uc.USER_COUPON_NAME, uc.USER_COUPON_ISSUEDAY, uc.USER_COUPON_USE, uc.USER_COUPON_USEDAY, uc.USER_COUPON_EXPIREDATE, c.COUPON_TYPE, c.COUPON_AMOUNT, c.COUPON_MAX_AMOUNT FROM T_USER_COUPON uc JOIN T_COUPON c ON uc.COUPON_ID = c.COUPON_ID WHERE uc.USER_ID = #{userId} AND uc.USER_COUPON_USE = 'N' ORDER BY uc.USER_COUPON_ISSUEDAY DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE T_USER_COUPON SET USER_COUPON_USE = 'Y', USER_COUPON_USEDAY = SYSDATE WHERE USER_COUPON_ID = #{userCouponId}
mapper.select: SELECT uc.USER_COUPON_ID, uc.USER_ID, uc.COUPON_ID, uc.USER_COUPON_NAME, uc.USER_COUPON_ISSUEDAY, uc.USER_COUPON_USE, uc.USER_COUPON_USEDAY, uc.USER_COUPON_EXPIREDATE, c.COUPON_TYPE, c.COUPON_AMOUNT, c.COUPON_MAX_AMOUNT FROM T_USER_COUPON uc JOIN T_COUPON c ON uc.COUPON_ID = c.COUPON_ID WHERE uc.USER_COUPON_ID = #{userCouponId}
